description: Sundar Pichai said his company will keep expanding its engineering ranks at least into 2026. Speaking at the Bloomberg Tech conference in San Francisco, Pichai said he will continue to invest in engineering in the near future.
title: Alphabet CEO Expects to Keep Hiring Engineers as AI Advances

description: Amazon is developing software for humanoid robots that could eventually take the jobs of delivery workers. The company is developing the Artificial Intelligence (AI) software that would power such robots, the report said, adding that Amazon plans to use hardware from other firms in its tests, for now.
title: Amazon Said to Be Preparing to Test Humanoid Robots for Deliveries

description: Apple has brought in Tata Group to handle repairs for iPhones and MacBook devices in its fast-growing Indian market. The latest contract award signals Apple's growing confidence on Tata as it hopes to win more business from the world's most valuable smartphone company.
title: Apple Said to Have Given iPhone Repair Business to Tata India as Partnership Expands

description: Hugging Face released an open-source vision language action (VLA) artificial intelligence (AI) model on Tuesday. Dubbed SmolVLA, the large language model is aimed at robotics workflows and training-related tasks. The company claims that the AI model is small and efficient enough to run locally on a computer with a single GPU, or a MacBook.
title: Hugging Face Releases SmolVLA Open Source AI Model For Robotics Workflows

description: Redmi Pad 2 has been launched in select global markets on Thursday. The new Android tablet comes in two colourways with an 11-inch screen and 2.5K resolution. The Redmi Pad 2 runs on the MediaTek Helio G100 Ultra chipset alongside up to 8GB RAM and maximum 256GB storage. It carries a 9,000mAh battery and a quad speaker unit with Dolby Atmos support.
title: Redmi Pad 2 With 9,000mAh Battery, MediaTek Helio G100 Ultra Chip Launched: Price, Specifications

description: The Ethereum Foundation (EF) has revamped its treasury strategy. The EF plans to prioritise the refinement its asset-liability management policy by factoring-in the risk, duration, and liquidity parameters, it said in its statement on June 4.
title: Ethereum Foundation Announces Overhauled Treasury Strategy Amid Scaling Push

description: Google is increasing the rate limit of its Gemini 2.5 Pro artificial intelligence (AI) model. On Wednesday, a company executive announced that the AI model, which is currently only available to the paid subscribers, will now allow users to send 100 queries instead of 50. This increased rate limit will only apply to the Google AI Pro subscribers, as the AI Ultra already offers a higher rate limit.
title: Google Doubles Gemini 2.5 Pro Rate Limit for Google AI Pro Subscribers

description: Huawei Pura 80 series will be launched in China next week. As the launch date nears, Huawei has started accepting pre-reservations for the Huawei Pura 80 Pro and Huawei Pura 80 Pro+ in its home country. The listing reveals the rear design of the upcoming phones. The Huawei Pura 80 Pro and Huawei Pura 80 Pro+ are confirmed to ship with HarmonyOS 5.0.
title: Huawei Pura 80 Pro, Pura 80 Pro+ Design Teased; Pre-Reservation Begin

description: Mistral Code, an artificial intelligence (AI) coding assistant, was introduced by the company on Wednesday. The Paris-based AI firm highlighted that the platform was built for enterprise developers, and is designed to help them increase their productivity while writing and deploying code. The platform is powered by the company’s in-house AI models, and offers enterprises flexibility to adapt them to their needs.
title: Mistral Code AI-Powered Coding Assistant Introduced for Enterprise Developers

description: Nothing Headphone 1 will be launched in global markets next month, including India. Nothing CEO Carl Pei announced at SXSW London that the Heaphone 1 will debut alongside the upcoming Nothing Phone 3 on July 1. This will expand Nothing's audio lineup, which already includes several semi-transparent TWS earphones and the open-ear Nothing Ear Open.
title: Nothing Headphone 1 Launch Date Set for July 1, to Arrive Alongside Nothing Phone 3

description: The OnePlus Pad 3 packs a slim and lightweight design. The handset features a 13.2-inch LCD display with a 3.4K resolution. The tablet is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor and features up to 16GB of LPDDR5X RAM and up to 512GB UFS 4.0 storage.
title: OnePlus Pad 3 First Impressions

description: Apple and Alibaba's rollout of artificial intelligence services in China is being delayed by a Beijing regulator. Industry analysts have pointed to the absence of advanced AI features - a key selling point in latest-generation smartphones - as a significant disadvantage for Apple in the Chinese market.
title: Apple and Alibaba's AI Rollout in China Said to Be Delayed by Trump's Trade War

description: Apple was unable to convince a US appeals court to halt significant portions of a federal judge's ruling that mandates it to swiftly introduce more competition within its highly profitable App Store. The 9th US Circuit Court of Appeals rejected Apple's request.
title: Apple Loses Bid to Pause App Store Reform Order in Epic Games Case

description: Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis reportedly highlighted that the company is working on a “next-generation email” assistant. As per the report, Hassabis made the statement while speaking at the South by Southwest (SXSW) London festival, recently. He highlighted the need to change the existing email system and to replace it with an artificial intelligence (AI) tool that can respond to messages and make some of the easier decisions as well.
title: Google DeepMind’s Demis Hassabis Wants to Build AI Email Assistant That Can Reply in Your Style: Report

description: OnePlus 13s is the latest compact smartphone in India, offering flagship-level performance in a compact design. It features the powerful Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, like its larger sibling, the OnePlus 13. The OnePlus 13s enters a competitive segment, that includes the iQOO 13. Both phones share the same advanced chipset, Android version, and storage configurations. Here's a detailed comparison of the OnePlus 13s vs iQOO 13.
title: OnePlus 13s vs iQOO 13: Price in India, Specifications and Features Compared

description: Oppo is getting ready to unveil a new smartphone in India. The Chinese tech brand shared a teaser on Thursday without revealing the moniker or any specifications. The upcoming device is speculated to belong to either Oppo's Reno 14 series or the Oppo K13 series. The Oppo Reno 14 and Reno 14 Pro were launched in China in May with MediaTek Dimensity chipsets. They feature 50-megapixel selfie shooters and support 80W wired fast charging.
title: Oppo Confirms Arrival of New Smartphone in India; Could Be the Reno 14

description: Reddit has accused anthropic of stealing data from its platform to train its AI models despite publicly assuring it wouldn't. According to the complaint, Anthropic has resisted entering a licensing agreement even as it trained its Claude chatbot on Reddit content, despite assuring last July it had blocked its bots from accessing Reddit's platform.
title: Reddit Sues AI Startup Anthropic for Allegedly Using Data Without Permission

description: Redmi Pad 2 will be unveiled in India on June 18. The company has also teased the design and colour options of the tablet. Based on the images, the upcoming tablet appears to closely resembles the global 4G variant. The Indian version is expected to include AI-powered features and offer support for a stylus. The Redmi Pad 2 will feature a larger display and a bigger battery compared to the original Redmi Pad.
title: Redmi Pad 2 India Launch Date Set for June 18; Design, Colour Options Teased

description: USDC-issuer Circle priced its upsized US initial public offering (IPO) at $31 (roughly Rs. 2,660) apiece, raising $1.05 billion (roughly Rs. 9,001 crore), adding fresh momentum. Circle will start trading on the NYSE under the symbol "CRCL" on Thursday.
title: Stablecoin Issuer Circle Raises $1.05 Billion in Upsized US IPO

description: Starlink is said to have moved a step closer towards its launch in India. According to a report, the Elon Musk-owned company is soon expected to receive the Global Mobile Personal Communication by Satellite (GMPCS) license from the Department of Telecommunications (DoT). This license grants permission to satellite-based network service providers for the deployment of satellite terminals, in compliance with global standards. However, Amazon’s satellite project may reportedly have to wait for the same approval.
title: Starlink Reportedly Nears India Launch With DoT Approval for GMPCS License Expected Soon

description: Nintendo Switch 2, Nintendi's first brand-new gaming platform in eight years, launched on Thursday. The hybrid console, a successor to the phenomenally successful Nintendo Switch, brings a host of upgrades over its predecessor, including a bigger screen, better graphics and performance, redesigned Joy-Con controllers, new social features and more.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Launches With 7.9-Inch LCD Display, Joy-Con 2 Controllers

description: OnePlus Pad 3 was launched in India on Thursday alongside the OnePlus 13s. The latest Android tablet from the Chinese tech brand arrives in two colourways and features a 13.2-inch display with 3.4K resolution and 7:5 aspect ratio. The OnePlus Pad 3 has a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset under the hood with up to 16GB of RAM and up to 512GB of storage. It packs a 12,140mAh battery with 80W SuperVOOC fast charging.
title: OnePlus Pad 3 With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, 12,140mAh Battery Launched in India: Specifications

description: Google Pixel 10 series is expected to be unveiled later this year. The lineup will likely include the Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, a 10 Pro XL and a 10 Pro Fold. There have been a barrage of leaks on these phones lately, and a new report has now surfaced online suggesting the colour options of the lineup. As per the report, Google could do away with some classic colour options like Obsidian and Porcelain, which have been around since the Pixel 7 series.
title: Pixel 10 Series Colour Options Tipped; Google Could Drop Iconic Hues

description: Xiaomi’s fitness tracking smart band has not seen an official India launch for a few years in a row, however, the product has been on sale in other markets. A tipster has now shared the complete specifications along with what appear to be near-official renders of the Xiaomi Smart Band 10 along with the expected price for Europe.
title: Xiaomi Smart Band 10 Leaked Images Suggests a Familiar Design; Specifications Tipped

description: Google on Wednesday rolled out the Android 16 QPR1 Beta 1.1 to developers and testers. Initially introduced on Pixel, the update arrives almost two weeks after Google released Android 16 following the I/O 2025 developer conference. It is said to carry fixes for various issues reported by users in previous iterations. This includes resolutions for a bug that caused the navigation buttons to become unresponsive, fingerprint authentication failure, and app crashes.
title: Android 16 QPR1 Beta 1.1 With Bug Fixes Rolling Out for Pixel Devices: All Details

description: Gaming fans queued up for the launch of Nintendo's Switch 2 on Thursday. In the Ikebukuro shopping district of Tokyo, dozens of successful applicants to a sales lottery by electronics retailer Bic Camera lined up before the store opened to collect their devices.
title: Gamers Line Up for Nintendo Switch 2 Launch with Global Shortfall Expected

description: OpenAI released two new utility features for ChatGPT users on Wednesday. The artificial intelligence (AI) app on MacOS now has a Record Mode that can capture meetings, brainstorming sessions, and voice notes, and transcribe and summarise the main discussion points. This feature is currently only available to the ChatGPT Team subscribers.
title: OpenAI Brings ChatGPT Record Mode on MacOS, Adds Tool to Connect to Gmail and Outlook

description: Tecno Pova Curve 5G is now available for purchase in India. The 5G phone with a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultimate SoC was announced in the country last week. It has a dual rear camera unit comprising a 64-megapixel primary sensor. The Tecno Pova Curve 5G carries a 5,500mAh battery with 45W charging support. The handset has a 7.45mm-thick design and an IP64-rated build for dust and water resistance.
title: Tecno Pova Curve 5G Goes on Sale in India for the First Time Today: Price, Sale Offers, Specifications

description: Truecaller on Wednesday announced that it has crossed three million paying subscribers globally. This growth is attributed to the new features it added to its paid consumer offering which allows users to take advantage of artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities for call screening and spam protection. The Swedish caller identification app also recorded a 16 percent growth on the iOS platform compared to March 31, when 0.86 million subscribers on Apple devices were recorded.
title: Truecaller Crosses 3 Million Paying Subscribers Globally; 16 Percent Growth in iOS Users

description: Bazooka is an action-packed cat and rat game thriller In which a businessman and a cop are on a hunt to find a psychopath who is killing innocent people in the event games. Covered by clues and clever strategies, the events are circulated as video games by the killer to kill people strategically. An ex-forensic expert and cop collaborate to find the psychopath, and together, they come across a painting that holds the key to stopping this killing.
title: Bazooka OTT Release Reportedly Revealed Online: What You Need to Know

description: IO Interactive revealed 007 First Light, its upcoming action-adventure title that reimagines the origin story of James Bond, at PlayStation State of Play Wednesday. The will launch on PC, PS5, Xbox Series S/X and Nintendo Switch 2 in 2026.
title: IO Interactive Reveals James Bond Origin Story Game 007 First Light, Set for Release in 2026

description: Don’t miss One of Them Days, the wild and warm comedy starring SZA and Keke Palmer. Now streaming on Netflix, a must-watch ride through LA chaos and friendship.
title: One of Them Days Now Available on Netflix: Everything You Need to Know

description: OnePlus 13s is the company's latest smartphone with flagship Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and a 5,800mAh battery. This smartphone swaps an ultrawide camera for a compact design, and it costs less than most flagship smartphones available today. Find out more about the new flagship killer in our OnePlus 13s review.
title: OnePlus 13s Review: A Compact, Feature-Packed Powerhouse

description: OnePlus 13s was launched in India on Thursday. The smartphone comes with a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and a 5,850mAh battery with 80W fast charging support. The compact handset sports a 6.32-inch 1.5K LTPO display and carries a customisable Plus Key. For optics, it is equipped with a 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit alongside a 32-megapixel selfie shooter.
title: OnePlus 13s With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, 5,850mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Oppo Reno 14 series was launched in China last month, and the lineup is expected to make its global debut soon. Now, Oppo appears to be readying the Reno 14F 5G model. The unannounced Reno 14 series smartphone has been spotted on the NBTC website. The phone has reportedly also been listed on other websites, including Indonesia's SDPPI, Infocomm Media Development Authority (IMDA) certification site and European EEC.
title: Oppo Reno 14F 5G Listed on NBTC Site, Hints at Key Specifications

description: Our Fault, the last chapter of Culpables after Your Fault and My Fault, is now back for its previous and final chapter. In this, Noah and Nick cross paths around their friend's wedding; as Noah is on her professional journey and moves ahead of the breakup, Noah and Nick find themselves confronting unresolved emotions and feelings. So what does the last chapter have in it? Who fault is it really, or will the title stay true to it'sits name, and will it be the fault of the two? Stay tuned to watch it on Amazon Prime in October 2025.
title: Our Fault OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Final Chapter of Culpables Online?

description: Catch the acclaimed thriller Stolen, now streaming on Prime Video. This socially conscious film explores motherhood, bias, and justice through the harrowing story of a stolen child in rural India.
title: Stolen Now Streaming on Amazon Prime Video: What You Need to Know About its Cast, Plot, and more

description: Xiaomi 16 display and battery specifications have been leaked by a Chinese tipster, weeks ahead of the handset's anticipated debut. The smartphone is expected to feature a large 7,000mAh battery, which is considerably larger than the 5,240mAh battery on the company's current Xiaomi 15 model.
title: Xiaomi 16 Tipped to Arrive With 7,000mAh Battery, Display Size Leaked

description: Samsung is expected to unveil its Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 foldable smartphones soon. A new report claims that an Unpacked launch event will take place in New York to unveil the handsets. The South Korean giant has not yet confirmed this claim. The event is tipped to take place some time next month, although an exact date has not yet been reported.
title: Samsung Could Unveil Galaxy Z Fold 7 & Z Flip 7 at New York Unpacked Event: Details Inside

description: WWDC 2025 kicks off next week with Apple expected to preview the latest operating system (OS) iterations for its devices, but that may not be all. As per a report, the company will announce several new features for its audio products such as the AirPods Pro 2 and the AirPods 4. It could bring new head gestures which may allow users to toggle Conversation Awareness to adjust volume by moving their head.
title: AirPods Pro 2, AirPods 4 to Reportedly Get New Head Gestures, Camera Control and Other Features

description: Earlier this year, Meta announced Aria Gen 2 as a research-focussed wearable device and the successor to 2020’s Project Aria. The company has now taken a deep dive into the technology which powers the second generation of the AI and ML-powered smart glasses. It comes with a number of improvements compared to the first generation model, featuring upgraded sensors, hand and eye tracking systems, and a photoplethysmography (PPG) sensor just like the Apple Watch.
title: Meta Aria Gen 2 Glasses to Offer Advanced Hand and Eye Tracking, PPG Sensor, and More
